General.Name: Mitre Mining Corporation Ltd
General.Description: Mitre Mining Corporation Limited engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Australia. The company explores for gold, rare earth element, and other base metal deposits. It holds interests in the Batemans and Araluen projects located in New South Wales. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Melbourne, Australia.

1.Name: Mr. Adrien Michele Wing B.Acc, B.Bus, C.P.A., CPA
1.Title: Independent Non-Exec. Director & Company Sec.
